page.title: 05Growing Up On Farms Is Fun.
page.content: We all agree it is great fun living on a farm.We would not like town life because of traffic & fumes. Here is fresh air & quiet space to play.Nearby live relatives.Only our cats dislike visitors who couldn't even take a photo of them.Our collies work.Our cats keep down vermin.Girls & boys alike enjoy working with animals & on the land or driving when old enough to help our fathers.Girls also help in the house. Among us we play the fiddle,recorder, piano,guitar & chanter before progressing to bagpipes.Some of us go to Highland Dancing.Many of our homes & farms are about a hundred years old & are often passed down through generations. We see nature around us though pests, especially rabbits,are controlled by shooting,snaring or ferreting.
